description:
1. Fumi and friends are completely into Cinderella on TV.  Mom blurts
out about things starting to go downhill.  Hearing that they…
2. Bunji and co are at a group study session at Gonda’s house. They
start making a ton of noise which causes Gonda’s mom to run in. With
the fear of being thumped by Gonda’s Mom; Bunji and co discover the
weakness...
3. Mom is stuck at home after failing to finish her work. She lets Jon
into the house and has to feed, walk, and spend time with him but…
4. Bunji has recently been falling asleep anywhere and anytime: during
karate practice, washing his hands, and at meals.  One Sunday, mom
leaves him alone and lets him sleep…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: From This Point On / Fight / Jon and Mom / Sleep
ここから先が / ケンカ / ジョンとかあさん / 寝る
